channel.title: dm_bounce FPS Drop (MP)
channel.description:
I've experienced significant fps drops at one spot on the dm_bounce map. Is this a common issue?
Generally I get well above 100 fps (usually between 120-150) but when overlooking a specific part of dm_bounce it drops to 60 and below. It happens in the area of the screenshot.
GTX 970 + i5 3570k on recommended settings. ![2015-05-09_00005 - Copy.jpg|690x500](upload://7KSkw4yfCDQfTMQ3DoJ6kPusHmW.jpeg)

item.title: dm_bounce FPS Drop (MP)
item.dc:creator: Morloc
item.description:
Just to add to this, Im currently doing another optimising pass which I hope will help, which should go up within the week. I am also looking at some other things as well so Im sure there will be a few more updates periodically

thanks for the feedback - keep it coming

Read full topic

item.title: dm_bounce FPS Drop (MP)
item.dc:creator: LamarrsAnomaly
item.description:
I’m glad to hear it’s an issue that is being addressed. It really is a great looking map so I hope you guys figure out the optimization issues!

Read full topic

item.title: dm_bounce FPS Drop (MP)
item.dc:creator: TextFAMGUY1
item.description:
Craig is working on further optimising Bounce. He has struggled with it a lot - the huge open layout of the map does not lend itself to being optimised easily, especially given how detailed and gorgeous the map is. He spent the last 2 months of development optimising it, and it still has a ways to go, unfortunately. We’ll sort it!

Read full topic
